name: VS Code
useCase: Primary code editor for all development work
notes: Excellent extensions ecosystem, built-in terminal, and great TypeScript support

name: GitHub
notes: Essential for code versioning, CI/CD, and open source contributions

name: Figma
notes: Best-in-class collaborative design tool with excellent developer handoff

name: Notion
notes: Flexible workspace for organizing thoughts and projects

name: Docker
notes: Excellent for creating reproducible development environments

name: Postman
notes: Comprehensive API development and testing platform

name: Tableau
notes: Powerful tool for creating interactive dashboards and insights

name: Jupyter Notebooks
notes: Perfect for iterative data analysis and sharing research

name: Slack
notes: Great for team coordination with good integrations

name: Linear
notes: Fast, beautiful interface with excellent keyboard shortcuts

name: Arc Browser
useCase: Web browsing with enhanced productivity features
notes: Innovative browser with workspaces and excellent tab management

name: iTerm2
notes: Feature-rich terminal with split panes and customization options

name: Raycast
notes: Replaces Spotlight with powerful extensions and workflows

name: 1Password
notes: Excellent security with great browser integration

name: Loom
notes: Quick and easy screen recording for async communication
